html:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Adidas, Evolution and Hays, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Adidas AG ADSGn.DE: RBC raises to outperform rating

* Evolution AB (Publ) EVOG.ST: Citigroup raises to buy from neutral

* Flutter Entertainment Plc FLTRF.L: Citigroup raises to buy from sell

* Hays HAYS.L: Credit Suisse raises to outperform from underperform

* Natwest Group Plc NWG.L: Jefferies cuts to hold from buy

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* ABN Amro Bank NV ABNd.AS: HSBC raises target price to EUR 15 from EUR 13

* Abrdn Plc ABDN.L: Citigroup raises price target to 265p from 260p

* Acerinox SA ACX.MC: Deutsche Bank raises target price to EUR 18 from EUR 17
